JSON-RPC Viewer 0.0.1

This Google Chrome extension helps to view HTTP JSON-RPC requests in a convenient way.

Left pane shows completed http requests which are JSON-RPC 2.0 requests. Each line begins with a JSON-RPC method name. Time shows overall request (including network) time in milliseconds, and Size is a response body size in bytes.

Method names are colored. Colors are for: successful and failed requests (according to JSON-RPC response). If response is too large to parse, it will appear in purple.

Click list item to see JSON for params and result/error in right panes.

Click Clear to clear the list.

Feature requests, bug reports and pull requests goes here: https://github.com/kityan/json-rpc-viewer
